snippet.title: Knot Me! Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Knot Me! is a 3D action-adventure game designed to explore sexual kinks, sexual culture, sexual consent, and other taboo topics. The player controls Regina, a possum-girl, and Señor Edgar, her talking bondage rope. Using Señor Edgar’s ability to tie knots, swing from overhead fixtures, and whip a short distance in front of her, Regina explores the four floors of Red Velvet while on a mission to interview the elusive Spider Queen of Bondage.
https://lemontwistgames.itch.io/knot-me
